instructions.name: counter_party_withdraw_sol
docs: Allows the fee admin to withdraw SOL from the global counter party wallet.

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Handles depositing an LST into the StakePoolBond and mints PTs and YTs to the depositor.

instructions.name: deposit_sol
docs: For using SOL to deposit into an LST Bond

instructions.name: deposit_sol_msol
docs: For using SOL to deposit into an mSOL based LST Bond

instructions.name: initialize_global_settings
docs: Initializes the GlobalSettings state with the passed keys and fee rates.

instructions.name: initialize_solo_validator_bond
docs: This instruction is used to create a bond against a single validator node. All deposits
(whether SOL or stake accounts) will be delegated to this single validator.

instructions.name: initialize_stake_pool_bond
docs: Initializes a new StakePoolBond given the stake pool, issuance timestamp, maturity
timestamp, and PT and YT metadata.

instructions.name: solo_validator_deposit_sol
docs: For using a Stake account to deposit into a Solo Validator Bond

instructions.name: solo_validator_deposit_stake
docs: For using a Stake account to deposit into a SoloValidatorBond
There is a current deposit minimum of 1 SOL

instructions.name: solo_validator_handle_maturity
docs: Must be called after a SoloValidatorBond has matured and before anyone can redeem their
PRs or YTs.
This instruciton makes sure the transient stake account has been merged, if needed

accounts.name: owner_stake_account
docs: Empty account where a new stake account will be created

accounts.name: owner_stake_account
docs: Empty account where a new stake account will be created

instructions.name: update_fee_settings
docs: Updates the fee portions of the GlobalSettings
requires globalAdmin authority

instructions.name: update_halt_admin
docs: Updates the halt admin on GlobalSettings
requires globalAdmin authority

instructions.name: update_halt_status
docs: Updates the halt status on GlobalSettings
requires haltAdmin authority

fields.name: stake_pool
docs: The stake_pool acount on the StakePool program or State account on the mSOL account

fields.name: lst_vault
docs: The token account that holds the deposited / staked LSTs

fields.name: lst_program
docs: deployed SPL StakePool or mSOL program for the given LST

fields.name: issuance_ts
docs: Unix timestamp for the bond's issuance date

fields.name: maturity_ts
docs: Unix timestamp for the bond's maturity

fields.name: principal_token_mint
docs: The address of the Mint account for the principal tokens

fields.name: yield_token_mint
docs: The address of the Mint account for the yield tokens

fields.name: bump_seed
docs: Bump seed for the Bond's PDA

fields.name: maturity_handled
docs: Flag for whether or not maturity was handled

fields.name: issuance_close_ts
docs: Unix timestamp for the bond's closing date for new deposits.
No closing time will be enforced if value is 0.

fields.name: reward_commissions
docs: Commission fees taken on staking rewards by issuer.

fields.name: issuer
docs: The public key used to identify the issuer.

fields.name: lst_for_all_pt_at_redemption
docs: The amount of LST bucketed for all PT

fields.name: bond_lst_bal_at_first_redemption
docs: The amount of LSTs the bond vault had at first redemption

fields.name: pt_supply_at_first_redemption
docs: The total supply of PT at the first redemption

fields.name: yt_supply_at_first_redemption
docs: The total supply of YT at the first redemption

fields.name: validator_vote_account
docs: The validator's vote account key

fields.name: stake_account
docs: The stake account owned by this bond

fields.name: transient_stake_account
docs: The transient stake account owned by this bond

fields.name: issuance_ts
docs: Unix timestamp for the bond's issuance date

fields.name: maturity_ts
docs: Unix timestamp for the bond's maturity

fields.name: principal_token_mint
docs: The address of the Mint account for the principal tokens

fields.name: yield_token_mint
docs: The address of the Mint account for the yield tokens

fields.name: bump_seed
docs: Bump seed for the Bond's PDA

fields.name: maturity_handled
docs: A flag to determine if the handle_maturity instruction has been called.
This must be true for PTs and YTs to be redeemed

fields.name: completely_unstaked
docs: A flag that's true if the stake_account has been completely unstaked. This is necessary
to mitigate an [extreme edge case where an] adversary could hijack the stake account
authorities and brick the last SOL redemptions.

fields.name: stake_withdrawn
docs: A flag to indicate when the stake_account has been withdrawn and should never be trusted
again

fields.name: transient_lamports
docs: A value that gets incremented or decremented as transient stake is being moved. This
is an important accounting measure to mitigate the affects of an adversary hijacking
the transient_stake_account authorities, inflating the lamports on the account, and
withdrawing more from their YTs than they should.

fields.name: redemption_cache
docs: Redemption cache used to calculate PT and YT exchange rates

fields.name: issuance_close_ts
docs: Unix timestamp for the bond's closing date for new issuance.
No closing time will be enforced if value is 0.

fields.name: reward_commissions
docs: Commission fees taken on staking rewards by issuer.

fields.name: issuer
docs: The public key used to identify the issuer.

fields.name: single_depositor
docs: The only user allowed to deposit to bond if value is set.
